${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Bakaham.NAME: Bakaham
${modID}:Bakaham.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to Attack, draw a card.

${modID}:JagerBomb.NAME: Jager Bomb
${modID}:JagerBomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
${modID}:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your max *Satiety by !M!. NL Gain 1 *Satiety. NL *Exhaust.

${modID}:Hunger.NAME: Hunger
${modID}:Hunger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose ALL *Satiety. NL *Schedule 3: *Dinner *Round *II.

${modID}:HokkaidoUniBuffet.NAME: Hokkaido Uni Buffet
${modID}:HokkaidoUniBuffet.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, *Satiety will not trigger and you cannot draw additional cards.

${modID}:SleepDebt.NAME: Sleep Debt
${modID}:SleepDebt.DESCRIPTION: Enemies take damage equal to their *Fatigue at the end of your turn.
${modID}:SleepDebt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enemies take damage equal to their *Fatigue at the end of your turn.

${modID}:GroupProject.NAME: "Group" Project
${modID}:GroupProject.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if an enemy is asleep. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:Baguette.NAME: Baguette
${modID}:Baguette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Bread to your hand.
${modID}:Baguette.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 *Bread to your hand.

${modID}:ExquisitelyStuffed.NAME: Exquisitely Stuffed
${modID}:ExquisitelyStuffed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each *Satiety you have.

${modID}:ShrimpChips.NAME: Shrimp Chips
${modID}:ShrimpChips.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.
${modID}:ShrimpChips.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:CodeReview.NAME: Code Review
${modID}:CodeReview.DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Apply !M! *Fatigue.
${modID}:CodeReview.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile and upgrade it. NL Apply !M! *Fatigue.

${modID}:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
${modID}:Leftovers.DESCRIPTION: Discard all *Food cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards for each card discarded.

${modID}:SubwayNap.NAME: Subway Nap
${modID}:SubwayNap.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue. NL If this puts the target to *Sleep Draw 2 more cards next turn.

${modID}:UtilityScience.NAME: Utility Science
${modID}:UtilityScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, gain !M! *Wrinkler.
${modID}:UtilityScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, gain !M! *Wrinkler. NL *Innate.

${modID}:Croissant.NAME: L'Appartement 4F
${modID}:Croissant.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Bread this turn, NL gain !M! *Belly *Size. NL *Exhaust.
${modID}:Croissant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Retain. NL Whenever you play a *Bread this turn, NL gain !M! *Belly *Size. NL *Exhaust.

${modID}:ThinkingWithPortals.NAME: Thinking With Portals
${modID}:ThinkingWithPortals.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Return !M! other cards from your discard pile to your hand. NL *Exhaust.
${modID}:ThinkingWithPortals.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Return !M! other cards from your discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Understand.NAME: Understand.
${modID}:Understand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Events triggered by this card are triggered !M! additional times.

${modID}:Leipaa.NAME: Leipää
${modID}:Leipaa.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of *Bread played this combat.

${modID}:SpiritIsland.NAME: Spirit Island
${modID}:SpiritIsland.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the last turn ended early, repeat !M! times.

${modID}:SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL End your turn. NL *Ethereal.
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL End your turn.

${modID}:AutomationScience.NAME: Automation Science
${modID}:AutomationScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal 18 or more damage in a single hit, gain !M! *Punctual.

${modID}:Connoisseur.NAME: Connoisseur
${modID}:Connoisseur.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 2 Dexterity. NL Lose !M! *Belly *Size.

${modID}:XChairMethod.NAME: X-Chair Method
${modID}:XChairMethod.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies X times.
${modID}:XChairMethod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies X+1 times.

${modID}:Inception.NAME: Inception
${modID}:Inception.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is asleep, apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:FoodComa.NAME: Food Coma
${modID}:FoodComa.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue. NL If you have 2 or more *Satiety, gain [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:Cheesecake.NAME: Cheesecake
${modID}:Cheesecake.DESCRIPTION: Double your *Satiety. NL If this ends your turn, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:SweetDreams.NAME: Sweet Dreams
${modID}:SweetDreams.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy falls asleep, gain !M! Block at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:HyperEntropy.NAME: HyperEntropy
${modID}:HyperEntropy.DESCRIPTION: Open a *Hyperfloor after this combat. NL Lose !M! Max HP. NL *Exhaust.

${modID}:Karaoke.NAME: Karaoke
${modID}:Karaoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Schedule !M!: *Amp.
${modID}:Karaoke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL *Schedule !M!: *Amp+.

${modID}:Amp.NAME: Amp
${modID}:Amp.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, it deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:DailyReminders.NAME: Daily Reminders
${modID}:DailyReminders.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each triggered event, *Schedule a copy of it in the last open slot.

${modID}:HappyBirthday.NAME: Happy Birthday
${modID}:HappyBirthday.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Schedule !M!: NL *The *Song. NL Add a *Happy *Birthday to your discard pile.
${modID}:HappyBirthday.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Schedule !M!: NL *The *Song+. NL Add a *Happy *Birthday to your discard pile.

${modID}:TheSong.NAME: The Song
${modID}:TheSong.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL *The *Song events by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Draft.NAME: Draft
${modID}:Draft.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand.
${modID}:Draft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

${modID}:ChefsTable.NAME: Chef's Table
${modID}:ChefsTable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Schedule 6: *Tasting *Menu. NL Lose !M! Gold.
${modID}:ChefsTable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Schedule 6: *Tasting *Menu+. NL Lose !M! Gold.

${modID}:TastingMenu.NAME: Tasting Menu
${modID}:TastingMenu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each *Satiety gained this combat. NL Gain 2 *Satiety.

${modID}:Drunkus.NAME: Drunkus
${modID}:Drunkus.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, double its damage and convert it to *Fatigue.
${modID}:Drunkus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, triple its damage and convert it to *Fatigue.

${modID}:DreadfulStrikes.NAME: Dreadful Strikes
${modID}:DreadfulStrikes.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, NL it deals !M! additional damage. NL While scheduled, increase this amount by 3 at the end of your turn.
${modID}:DreadfulStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, NL it deals !M! additional damage. NL While scheduled, increase this amount by 4 at the end of your turn.

${modID}:Lunch.NAME: Lunch
${modID}:Lunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! *Drowsy. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:FortyEightHourDay.NAME: 48 Hour Day
${modID}:FortyEightHourDay.DESCRIPTION: Events triggered this turn are rescheduled in the last open slot. NL *Exhaust.
${modID}:FortyEightHourDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Events triggered this turn are rescheduled in the last open slot.

${modID}:DateForm.NAME: Date Form
${modID}:DateForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Punctual for each Event in *Schedule. NL *Ethereal.
${modID}:DateForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Punctual for each Event in *Schedule.

${modID}:OneMoreRun.NAME: One More Run
${modID}:OneMoreRun.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [E].

${modID}:Gym.NAME: Gym
${modID}:Gym.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Strength for each *Satiety. At the end of this turn, lose that much *Strength.

${modID}:QualityTime.NAME: Quality Time
${modID}:QualityTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade all Events in *Schedule.

${modID}:Confession.NAME: Confession
${modID}:Confession.DESCRIPTION: The triggering card is played twice.
${modID}:Confession.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The triggering card is played three times.

${modID}:Kaboom.NAME: Kaboom
${modID}:Kaboom.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each *Scheduled event. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL *Exhaust the schedule.

${modID}:Cleaning.NAME: Cleaning
${modID}:Cleaning.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies for each Event *Exhausted.

${modID}:Drink.NAME: Drink!
${modID}:Drink.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, it deals !M! additional damage. NL Stacks if *Scheduled on another *Drink!.

${modID}:StackCup.NAME: Stack Cup
${modID}:StackCup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If no damage is taken before your next turn, *Schedule 2: Drink!.
${modID}:StackCup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! *Weak. NL If no damage is taken before your next turn, *Schedule 2: Drink!.

${modID}:MFUltimate.NAME: MF Ultimate
${modID}:MFUltimate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL If you take damage, *Exhaust this from the *Schedule.

${modID}:Jersey.NAME: Jersey
${modID}:Jersey.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, apply !M! *Fatigue to ALL enemies.

${modID}:CalendarTetris.NAME: Calendar Tetris
${modID}:CalendarTetris.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you *Schedule each turn, draw a card.

${modID}:DeepSleep.NAME: Deep Sleep
${modID}:DeepSleep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an effect ends your turn, gain !M! *Wrinkler.

${modID}:LogisticScience.NAME: Logistic Science
${modID}:LogisticScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain *Punctual, gain !M! *Strength, *Dexterity, and *Belly *Size this turn.

${modID}:RocketFactory.NAME: Rocket Factory
${modID}:RocketFactory.DESCRIPTION: After every !M! debuffs prevented by *Wrinkler, NL *Schedule 1: *Launch.
${modID}:RocketFactory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After every !M! debuffs prevented by *Wrinkler, NL *Schedule 1: *Launch. NL *Innate.

${modID}:Launch.NAME: Launch
${modID}:Launch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 1 *Burn into your draw pile.

${modID}:Bomb.NAME: Bomb
${modID}:Bomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:Bombe.NAME: Bombe
${modID}:Bombe.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if exactly 1 out of *Schedule slots 2 and 4 is empty, *Schedule 3: *Bomb.
${modID}:Bombe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if exactly 1 out of *Schedule slots 2 and 4 is empty, *Schedule 3: *Bomb+.

${modID}:SteamClub.NAME: Steam Club
${modID}:SteamClub.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each event triggered since the last *Steam *Club.

${modID}:RainCheck.NAME: Rain Check
${modID}:RainCheck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Push back the *Schedule as far as possible.

${modID}:EmergencyCoffee.NAME: La Cabra
${modID}:EmergencyCoffee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your cards trigger !M! additional event this turns. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:Pasta.NAME: Pasta
${modID}:Pasta.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase Block by !M! each time an enemy falls asleep. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:Metabolize.NAME: Metabolize
${modID}:Metabolize.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your hand is empty, NL Draw !M! card and gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:ThirteenWater.NAME: 13 Water
${modID}:ThirteenWater.DESCRIPTION: *Schedule a corresponding *Omakase *Course on the first available slot X times.
${modID}:ThirteenWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Schedule a corresponding *Omakase *Course on the first available slot X+1 times.

${modID}:FourthCourse.NAME: Fourth Course
${modID}:FourthCourse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies 2 times. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.
${modID}:FourthCourse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Fatigue to all enemies 3 times. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:FifthCourse.NAME: Fifth Course
${modID}:FifthCourse.DESCRIPTION: If triggered by an attack, it deals !M! additional damage. NL Gain 1 *Satiety.

${modID}:TidyUp.NAME: Tidy Up
${modID}:TidyUp.DESCRIPTION: End your turn. NL At the start of your next turn, gain !M! *Punctual that turn.

${modID}:DinnerRoundTwo.NAME: Dinner Round II
${modID}:DinnerRoundTwo.DESCRIPTION: Put the triggering card in your hand.
${modID}:DinnerRoundTwo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put the triggering card in your hand. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

${modID}:Bakery.NAME: Café d’Avignon
${modID}:Bakery.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Bread to your hand.
${modID}:Bakery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Bread to your hand. NL *Innate.

${modID}:SharedKitchen.NAME: Our Kitchen
${modID}:SharedKitchen.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your discard pile. NL *Schedule 5: *Reposses.
${modID}:SharedKitchen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your discard pile. NL *Schedule 5: *Reposses. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:Repossess.NAME: Repossess
${modID}:Repossess.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the chosen card to your hand.
${modID}:Repossess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the chosen card to your hand and upgrade it.
